Overwatch League Recap: Hangzhou Spark edge Guangzhou Charge https://www. dailyesports.gg/overwatch-leag ue-recap-hangzhou-spark-edge-guangzhou-charge/?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter … #GuangzhouCharge #HangzhouSpark #Overwatch pic.twitter.com/0TVWTkRs4p

Atlanta Reign Wins 3-1 over NYXL. Philadelphia Fusion Wins 4-0 over Houston Outlaws. LA Valiant wins 3-1 over Washington Justice. Hangzhou Spark Wins 3-2 over Guangzhou Charge . talk about an upset. Mad props to Atlanta for losing to Valiant and coming back with this win!

Ok, but did you know that the Guangzhou Charge logo is supposed to be the letters GZ? Or that the Dallas Fuel logo is supposed to be a flame? And that the Paris Eternal logo is supposed to be a rooster? Crazy right?

It's time for an Easter Egg Hunt Giveaway! Find the Overwatch Heroes hidden in the photos! Leave a comment with the total number of heroes and the names! All correct answers will be entered for a chance to win a GZ Charge Away Jersey Monday, 4/22 at noon! #Easter #FeelTheCharge pic.twitter.com/5jC4ZuT4oU

Overwatch Esports City Tour came to in77 mall in Hangzhou today. Live broadcast of the Overwatch League (Hangzhou Spark vs Guangzhou Charge ) + Local esports events. Lots of people attended. Good way to drive engagement locally. pic.twitter.com/fC7FxPMsdo
